entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblins are mentioned as having a conversation with Ted. They mention their duties being ill-fitting for their race.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is the one asking questions to the goblin.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is another goblin who is also having a conversation with Ted.

relationships.description: Ted asked the goblins about their duties.
Ted also asked Griphook similar questions.
